Reference

Functions for Data Handling

Generic helpers

varlist()

Variable List, Stata-style

pdf_safely()

Safely Export as PDF Without Overwriting the File

save_safely()

Safely Save R Object Without Overwriting the File

write_csv_safely()

Safely Save CSV File Without Overwriting the File

Functions for Vectors

Manipulate a single variable

scale_to_range()

Scale Numeric Vector to a Given Range

Mode()

Most Frequent Observation

roundp()

Round and Format p-Values

Functions for Descriptive Tables

Tabulate data

mytab()

Contingency Table (Deprecated, Use tabulate_rowcol Instead)

tsummary()

Summary of All Numeric Variables in a Data Frame

mygt()

Turn tibble into gt Table with Custom Formatting

table1()

Stratified Descriptive Tables Using gtsummary

rates()

Event Counts, Person-Time, Incidence Rates, and Cumulative Incidence (Risk).

Functions for Plots

Generating figures

stripplot()

Box and Whiskers/Jittered Dot Plot

corrmat()

Correlation plot
